# JSRakNet

Pure JavaScript implementaion of RakNet.

Originally created by HerryYT and filfat. This is not stable, please consider using https://github.com/extremeheat/node-raknet-native instead if possible.

## Install
```
npm i jsp-raknet
```

## Usage

See tests/ for usage.
